name: Sokuban (HaydnTheGreat)
description:
A short and sweet sokuban-style puzzle game. Cover all the goals in a level with a box by moving your character a pushing the boxes. Can you optimise your moves across all 6 levels to get the expert rank?

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD to move and push boxes

R to restart a level

Enter/Space to progress to the next level once complete

Mentions:

This is my first solo project. I've minimised the scope to ensure I focus on completing games in the future, not just start them! Incredibly happy to hear your feedback in the comments.

A HUGE thank you to Emilio who provided a fantastic tutorial covering the basics mechanics of this game - I have taken his code and made a fully functioning demo!

Assets:

https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
